config.bettercombat.clientConfig.isSwing: Attack instead of mining zero hardness blocks with weapons
config.bettercombat.clientConfig.isHighl:
Highlights the crosshair if enemies are close enough to strike.

config.bettercombat.clientConfig.isToolt: Show attack range attribute on weapon tooltips
config.bettercombat.clientConfig.isWeapo: Enable the playback of weapon swing sounds
